Topic.Title: letter that came to my email tax on AMZN is a fact

Message.Msg: The answer folks is to move your assets/wealth from the HFT manipulated markets to real ones. Everyone should start investing in productive/physical assets (those that can be moved are safer because taxes will disproportionately hit assets that are not mobile and have high transaction cost) because in this rigged manipulated world, "liquidity" only works for those with unlimited CB leverage to abuse the system and undermine real investment. Get out of electronic markets and into human ones. You will do betterm. Much better. And those that broke the system (or allowed it to be irreparably damaged) will feel the full weight.

Topic.Title: Consumer holding up very well here and this hits new highs!

Message.Msg: You better hope the market is behaving this week and the sell side crooks are still in cahoots with AMZN management. Don't you think it's a little suspicious the B of A kept they're rating and lowered their price target to $310. I think this stock may start to be hit by reality for a change. It will be harder for the crooks to stay on board if results stink yet again. A scared market does not say let me go buy this stock that just missed revenue estimates and guided down. So the best thing the company can do is show that they met estimates on the top and bottom line and guide in line to up. I've been wrong before but I don't see it happening. You might want to Youtube a few songs for this release. I've been enjoying Bruce Springsteen recently, might I suggest " I'm Going Down" and "Downbound Train" for your listening pleasure.
